story_galar_01_12000/2401_1001_0200_10: How did you get ahold of the data on sync stones?
story_galar_01_12000/2401_1001_0300_10: I received it from my new business partner.
story_galar_01_12000/2401_1001_0600_10:
That said, if it’s for the sake of a prosperous
future, I don’t care who I work with.
story_galar_01_12000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Sooner or later, I will manage all sync stones
and make use of them—for the future.
